price: Orang-orang yang kafir bagi mereka azab yang keras.  Dan orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan amal saleh bagi mereka ampunan dan pahala yang besar.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
